title: The Darkness II
description: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB)  The Darkness II is an intense first person shooter that puts you in the role of Jackie Estacado, don of a NY crime family and wielder of an ancient supernatural force of chaos known as The Darkness.

contentRating.label: M (Mature)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: The Darkness II Demo
childDownloads.description: Embrace the Darkness and download the demo. Become Jackie Estacado and master your demons as you experience the thrill of Quad-Wielding: slash, grab and throw with your Demon Arms while simultaneously firing two weapons.

childDownloads.title: The Darkness II - Picture Pack 1
childDownloads.description: Download The Darkness II’s official gamerpic pack featuring Demon Arms, devoured hearts and Darkness Powers!

childDownloads.title: The Darkness II - Picture Pack 2
childDownloads.description: Download The Darkness II’s official gamerpic pack featuring Johnny, Darkling, Jackie, and members of The Brotherhood!

childDownloads.title: The Darkness II - Picture Pack 3
childDownloads.description: Download The Darkness II’s official gamerpic pack featuring Jackie, Demon Arms, flying Darkling and more!

childDownloads.title: The Darkness II
childDownloads.description: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB)  The Darkness II is an intense first person shooter that puts you in the role of Jackie Estacado, don of a NY crime family and wielder of an ancient supernatural force of chaos known as The Darkness.

childDownloads.title: Official The Darkness II Theme
childDownloads.description: Embrace the Darkness on your Xbox Live dashboard with the official theme for The Darkness II.

childDownloads.title: E3 2011 Trailer
childDownloads.description: In this debut gameplay trailer, the intense story of The Darkness II is revealed as Jackie Estacado struggles to control his inner demons and fight the mysterious forces of the Brotherhood, who are trying to take the power of the Darkness away from him by any means necessary.

childDownloads.title: Inugami Costume
childDownloads.description: Outfit your avatar as the Japanese sword-wielding co-op character Inugami.

childDownloads.title: Jackie Estacado Costume
childDownloads.description: Become the bearer of the Darkness.

childDownloads.title: Jenny Romano Costume
childDownloads.description: Become the light in the Darkness.

childDownloads.title: Jimmy Wilson Costume
childDownloads.description: Outfit your avatar as the Scottish axe-wielding co-op character Jimmy.

childDownloads.title: JP Dumond Costume
childDownloads.description: Outfit your avatar as the Creole staff-wielding co-op character JP Dumond.

childDownloads.title: Launch Trailer
childDownloads.description: In this cinematic launch trailer, Jackie Estacado channels his inner demons and comes face to face with the Brotherhood, the mysterious organization that is trying to strip him of his power.

childDownloads.title: Release Date Announcement
childDownloads.description: Jackie Estacado has kept the terrible power of The Darkness bottled up since killing those responsible for the brutal murder of his girlfriend Jenny. This atmospheric trailer sets the mood and tone for what is to come.

childDownloads.title: Shoshanna Costume
childDownloads.description: Outfit your avatar as the ultra-efficient Israeli special forces co-op character Shoshanna.

childDownloads.title: Siphon
childDownloads.description: The mysterious weapon used by the Brotherhood to steal the Darkness from its host.

childDownloads.title: The Brotherhood Trailer
childDownloads.description: “The Brotherhood” trailer provides a unique in-depth look at the mysterious and formidable new enemy that Jackie Estacado must face. Their goal is to remove the Darkness from Jackie, and they have adapted tactics to combat its powers.

childDownloads.title: The Darkness II Logo Tee
childDownloads.description: Embrace the Darkness and wear the official game logo t-shirt.

childDownloads.title: The Darkness II Logo Tee
childDownloads.description: Embrace the Darkness and wear the official game logo t-shirt.

childDownloads.title: Vendettas Co-Op Trailer
childDownloads.description: The “Vendettas” trailer highlights the fast-paced and violent co-op experience that expands the universe of single-player story. Meet the four characters who have come together to form an alliance with Jackie Estacado in the fight against the Brotherhood.

childDownloads.title: Victor Cane
childDownloads.description: Equip yourself with Victor's cane.
